name: Limited partner
text:
ARTICLE 3.  LIMITED PARTNERS
 
     [§425E-301]  Limited partner.  A person becomes a limited partner:
     (1)  As provided in the partnership agreement;
     (2)  As the result of a conversion or merger under article 11; or
     (3)  With the consent of all the partners. [L 2003, c 210, pt of §1]
